title: Is this the appropriate board to report someone ELO boosting?
body:
Just need to know if this is the correct board to report someone that is ***blatantly obviously*** ELO boosting

Edit: to clarify, there was an account in one of my irl friend's ranked games that was being boosted

http://imgur.com/a/4HQen

Pretty obvious when a bronze 4 player that had a 30% win rate all of a sudden drops all the champs he was playing, picks up ADC out of the blue, and starts dominating every single game

replies.body: Just because one is having a bad game doesn't mean he's intentionally feeding!â„¢
Thats not what I mean. There was a player in one of my irl firends ranked games that is obviously being ELO boosted

I know, i was just memeing to make an impression of the average guy that posts on these boards.

This game is a fucking joke, the malphite who inted dunkey is still playing, still feeding and he's D3 now.
I get intentional feeders, trolls and retards every single game.
People think that plat is high elo.
98% of the playerbase doesn't know how to play.
Most rioters are ACTUALLY boosted with proofs also to back that up, but since they work for riot they will never be punished.
But if you say mean things you immediately have an horde of brainwashed idiots that hold pitchforks and torches against you despite you telling nothing but the truth.

This game is a scam money making machine, we can just take or break since they will NEVER listen. (Or rather, they hear what they want to hear.)

yo:

1. go to https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
2. go to submit a request
3. select the top option(general question)
4. say I found a scripter and include your evidence.

this is currently the only option

The appropriate place to report someone for elo boosting is at the end of the game with the report function. That is all you need to do.

On the boards there is a rule against name and shaming, so the names in your post will get deleted if you decide to post them here.
